hints.title: LSI Stability Under Bounded Perturbations
hints.content:
1588: :label: thm-lsi-perturbation
1589: 
1590: If the backbone generator $\mathcal{L}_0$ satisfies an LSI with constant $C_0$, and the perturbed generator is $\mathcal{L}_\epsilon = \mathcal{L}_0 + \epsilon \mathcal{V}$ where $\mathcal{V}$ is a bounded operator with:
1591: 
1592: $$
1593: \|\mathcal{V} f\|_{L^2(\pi)} \le K \|f\|_{H^1(\pi)}
1594: $$
1595: 
1596: then for $\epsilon < \epsilon^* = 1/(2KC_0)$, the perturbed generator satisfies an LSI with constant:
1597: 
1598: $$
1599: C_\epsilon \le \frac{C_0}{1 - 2\epsilon K C_0}

hints.label: cor-adaptive-lsi
hints.title: LSI for the ρ-Localized Adaptive Gas
hints.content:
1617: :label: cor-adaptive-lsi
1618: 
1619: For the adaptive gas with localization scale $\rho > 0$, the LSI constant depends on $\rho$ via:
1620: 
1621: $$
1622: C_{\text{LSI}}(\rho) \le \frac{C_{\text{LSI}}^{\text{backbone}}}{1 - \epsilon_F \cdot C_{\text{adapt}}(\rho)}
1623: $$
1624: 
1625: where $C_{\text{adapt}}(\rho) = O(F_{\text{adapt,max}}(\rho) / \kappa_x)$ quantifies the perturbation strength.
1626: 
1627: **Critical threshold:** Stability requires:
1628: 
1629: $$
1630: \epsilon_F < \epsilon_F^*(\rho) = \frac{1}{C_{\text{adapt}}(\rho)}
hints.raw_directive:
1614: ### 7.2. ρ-Dependent LSI Constants
1615: 
1616: :::{prf:corollary} LSI for the ρ-Localized Adaptive Gas
1617: :label: cor-adaptive-lsi
1618: 
1619: For the adaptive gas with localization scale $\rho > 0$, the LSI constant depends on $\rho$ via:
1620: 
1621: $$
1622: C_{\text{LSI}}(\rho) \le \frac{C_{\text{LSI}}^{\text{backbone}}}{1 - \epsilon_F \cdot C_{\text{adapt}}(\rho)}
1623: $$
1624: 
1625: where $C_{\text{adapt}}(\rho) = O(F_{\text{adapt,max}}(\rho) / \kappa_x)$ quantifies the perturbation strength.
1626: 
1627: **Critical threshold:** Stability requires:
1628: 
1629: $$
1630: \epsilon_F < \epsilon_F^*(\rho) = \frac{1}{C_{\text{adapt}}(\rho)}
1631: $$
